Text:
at least 2600 snatches, almost certainly many more, and not one 'thank you.'

for what it's worth, ez, thanks and keep up the good work.
Dear Eztv, thank you for supplying me each and every week with laughter.
EZTV rulez. and The Boondocks is the best show on American TV
Nice work EZ, thank you very much!!!
Got season 1,2 and 3 so far from you, with no problems at all!!!! Keep it up!!
Thank you for the upload eztv!!
Logging in just to say thanks Ez. I would watch this on TV but its just so much easier this way. :l Great show keep up the good work.
